questions.text: With which football league club did Ian Wright finish his career?
From which club did Leicester City buy Matt Elliott?
Which current non-league club does former Liverpool player Jan Molby manage?
Which club, apart from Newcastle United, play their home games at St. James Park?
Which club did John Gregory manage before Aston Villa?
How many winners of the English Premiership were there in the 20th century?
In the 1987 season how many goals did Clive Allen score for Tottenham Hotspur?
Which team won the last FA Cup Final replay?
How many FA Cup final appearances did Liverpool make in the 1990s?
Against which team did Arsenal clinch the 1998 Premiership title?
In which country did Chelsea win the 1998 Cup winners Cup?
In which year did Tottenham Hotspur win their last European trophy?
questions.explanation:
1984.

	UEFA Cup against Anderlecht on penalties.

questions.text: In 1984 Liverpool won their last European Cup against which team?
In their successful 1999 Champions League campaign how many goals did Manchester United score against Bayern Munich?
questions.explanation:
5.

	Bayern v Man U 2-2, Man U v Bayern 1-1, Man U v Bayern 2-1.

questions.text: In 1985 Everton won the Cup-Winners Cup against a team from which country?
In which country did Bryan Robson score England's fastest ever World Cup goal in?
Which of the following teams did Gary Lineker not score against in the 1986 World Cup?
Who did England beat for their first win of the 1990 World Cup tournament?
questions.explanation:
Egypt.

	The scorer was 1-0 and Mark Wright was the scorer.

questions.text: How many goals, not including penalty shoot-outs, did England score in Euro 96?
questions.explanation:
8.

	1 v Switzerland, 2 v Scotland, 4 v Holland, 1 v Germany.

questions.text: Who scored England's first goal in the 1998 World Cup?
